original_title: The Inner/Outer World of Shah Rukh Khan
overview: The Inner and Outer World of Shahrukh Khan is the release title for a pair of documentaries about Bollywood superstar Shahrukh Khan, both directed by the London-based writer and producer/director Nasreen Munni Kabir, an authority on Hindi cinema.
title: The Inner/Outer World of Shah Rukh Khan
